examples: he wasted his pay on drink
they saved a quarter of all their earnings

definitions.text: give money, usually in exchange for goods or services
examples: I paid four dollars for this sandwich

definitions.text: convey, as of a compliment, regards, attention, etc.; bestow

examples: How much does this savings certificate pay annually?

definitions.text: do or give something to somebody in return
examples: Does she pay you for the work you are doing?
It pays to go through the trouble

definitions.text: bear (a cost or penalty), in recompense for some action
examples: She had to pay the penalty for speaking out rashly
You'll pay for this opinion later
a favor that cannot be paid back
